modName: Dead Space Style Dwarven Plasma Cutter
summary: Adds Dead Space inspired Dwarven Plasma Cutter
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33101-1-1362971158.jpg[/img]
I just finished the story mode of Dead Space 3 so i felt like playing as Isaac Clarke in Skyrim, so i dug the Dead Space armor mod i found a long time ago and played Skyrim a bit while wearing that but i felt that my character is missing a suitable weapon so i made this mod

Adds a Dead Space inspired weapon called the Dwarven Plasma Cutter with custom models and sounds

= Adds the following item(s)
- Dwarven Plasma Cutter

= Installation
- Download Main File and extract the .ZIP or .RAR archive with Winrar, 7zip or any similar tool of your choice
- Open the folder you just extracted and copy the MESHES folder and .ESP file over to your Skyrim Data folder in
(:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonskyrimdata)
or
(:Program FilesThe Elder Scrolls V SkyrimData)
- Activate the ESP with either the game's default launcher or using Nexus Mod Manager

= Stats
- The Plasma Cutter is basically a stronger more energy efficient version of a lightning bolt staff and has a faster rate of fire

= Can be Crafted in a forge under Dwarven Smithing category
- 1x Leather Strip
- 1x Dwarven Metal Ingot
- 1x Large Dwemer Strut
- 1x Small Dwemer Lever
- 2x Dwemer Lever
- 2x Dwemer Cog
- 2x Dwemer Gear
- 4x Large Decorative Dwemer Strut
- "Dwarven Smithing" Perk

= Change Log
- v1 initial release
